title: Ticket #1585: Rename convert_ip_to_hostname
description:
In /src/condor_util_lib/condor_netdb.c, rename convert_ip_to_hostname to something clearer, perhaps convert_ip_to_nodns_hostname or convery_ip_to_fake_hostname. We want to emphasize that it is a very specialized function and not for general use.

To make it even safer, it should probably begin with 

ASSERT(nodns_enabled());
since it shouldn't be used if we're using DNS.

This may be a good thing to add as part of the #9 IPv6 work.
